channel.title: Posts on MaxDev's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MaxDev's Blog

item.title: Awesome WM
item.description: Awesome Window Manager is a Window Manager for Linux-based systems, based on DWM and configured in Lua,

item.title: NTFS File System
item.description: NTFS, officially NT File System but commonly called New Technology File System, is a Microsoft filesystem that has been the default on Windows since Windows NT 3.1. Support for NTFS has been incorporated into the Linux kernel in version 5.15.0 in 31.10.2021.

item.title: Zellij
item.description: Zellij is a relatively new terminal multiplexer, that is designed to be easy for beginners to understand and use, while still being very configurable and full of features more experienced users will appreciate.

item.title: Nix Package Manager
item.description: This is a standalone package manager, that, by default, is bundled with NixOS. I learned about it from ChrisTitusTech’s YouTube and Vlog It has one of the largest repositories (120 000+ packages) that has both free and open-source as well as proprietary software that is pretty up to date.

item.title: PAVU Control
item.description: PAVU Control (PulseAudioVolume Control), is a GUI front-end utility for pulseaudio sound server/daemon.
